detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract MultiVACToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MultiVACToken.sol#2-76) has payable functions:
	 - MultiVACToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MultiVACToken.sol#71-73)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
